Looks like the problem is that this was the first request to create the image 
registry, which came in a non-ui thread.
You have seen the NPE within LazyModelPresentation.computeDetail?
How can I help in getting this fixed?

I am unable to reproduce this problem on the latest code base. We have recently 
changed the way the image registry is created. Can you try to reproduce this 
problem on the Mac? (Thanks).
Works in I20030128 both on 1.3.1 and 1.4.1.
